effects: Your hit point maximum increases by 3, and by 1 whenever you gain a Sorcerer level.
While you arent wearing armor, your base AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Charisma modifier.
You always have the spells in the Draconic Spells table prepared at the sorcerer levels shown.
Choose one damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.
You have resistance to that type, and when you cast a spell that deals that type, you can add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll.
You manifest draconic wings for 1 hour and gain a fly speed of 60 feet.
You can dismiss the wings early (no action required).
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you spend 3 sorcery points (no action required) to restore its use.

effects: You can cast Summon Dragon without a material component.
You can cast it without concentration; if you do, the duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.
limits: You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain this use when you finish a long rest.
